plot: Warren's a loser. In the great winds of 2003 when the whole town was left with funny faces, Warren had his head in the sand.... No really. Find out what happens when the wind returns to Lake Breeze. (Tidy Town Award, 1983)
title: Lake Breeze
plot_es: Warren's a loser. In the great winds of 2003 when the whole town was left with funny faces, Warren had his head in the sand.... No really. Find out what happens when the wind returns to Lake Breeze. (Tidy Town Award, 1983)
